article: brazilian authorities should drop their criminal investigation into a deadly mid-air collision last year involving two u.s. pilots and allow technical experts to complete their probe into the disaster , an international pilots ' association said friday .
abstract: pilots group urges brazil to drop criminal investigation into fatal air crash
